```{r setup, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 3, fig.width = 8, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "../..")
# directories
workdir <- knitr::opts_knit$get("root.dir")
datadir <- file.path(workdir, "data")
figdir <- file.path(workdir, "figures")
ecdf_dir <- file.path(figdir, "era_adj_ecdfs")
ecdf_paths <- list.files(ecdf_dir, full.names = TRUE)

sapply(ecdf_paths, knitr::include_graphics())
```
